scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "bun run start:backend" "bun run start:frontend"
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "bun run dev:backend" "bun run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && bun run build" "cd frontend && bun run build"
scripts.clean: concurrently "cd backend && bun run clean" "cd frontend && bun run clean"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && bun run test" "cd frontend && bun run test"
